snippet: Chad Taylor, the Democratic candidate for Senate, filed a petition on Tuesday with the Kansas Supreme Court to have his name removed from the Nov. 4 ballot.
abstract: Chad Taylor, Democratic candidate for Senate from Kansas, files a petition with state supreme court to have his name removed from the ballot; moves comes less than a week after Taylor ended his campaign against Republican incumbent Sen Pat Roberts.
lead_paragraph: Chad Taylor, the Democratic candidate for Senate, filed a petition on Tuesday with the Kansas Supreme Court to have his name removed from the Nov. 4 ballot.

headline.main: Kansas: Democrat Asks to Be Removed From Ballot
headline.print_headline: Kansas: Democrat Asks to Be Removed From Ballot
